attributes.action: Take Marston Moretaine off the exempt list for RTB / RTA social housing
attributes.additional_details: We are extending the village every year and will soon be linked with housing developments all the way to Milton Keynes. We need to open Marston up for first time buyers who are stuck in social housing, and be able to have the chance in buying the home they are in
attributes.background: Marston Moretaine is on the exempt list of properties to buy off social housing. As you are probably aware there has been lots of new developments in various locations around Marston so I believe this isn’t the case anymore, and Marston isn’t a rural village.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Legislation only sets crtieria by which properties may be exempted from Right to Buy/Right to Acquire, not specific places that are exempt. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
